posts.post_title: Hall of Fame Project - 19th Century & Postcard Needs
posts.post_content:
Looking for low-grade examples of the following subjects. PM me or email me at [url]kmayusa6060@gmail.com[/url].

Alex Pompez (2006 Yellow HoF Postcard)
Cum Posey (2006 Yellow HoF Postcard)
Specific sets added. Let's add the first ever 19th century card to my collection!
Who wants to take my 19th Century V-Card?
Added Pompez and Posey to the list because they are postcards. I always forget this section includes postcards.
